mavlc.ast.nodes

Class ASTNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • mavlc.ast.nodes.ASTNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ASTTestWrapper, Expression, Function, LeftHandIdentifier, Module, RecordTypeDeclaration, SingleCase, Statement

    public abstract class ASTNode
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Abstract super-type of all AST-nodes.
    See Also:

        Type Parameters:
        RetTy - Return type used by visitor methods.
        ArgTy - Argument type used by visitor methods.
        Parameters:
        visitor - Instance of ASTNodeVisitor.
        obj - Additional argument, passed on to the visitor.
